attributes.action: Call for more Black, Asian and ethnic models in the fashion industry..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has been created to help more models of colour book more jobs in the fashion & Entertainment industry.

Mahogany Model Management and Top model of colour (TMC) have been created to play a pivotal role in exposing black & ethnic models into mainstream fashion and entertainment. (By models of colour we mean models of African, Caribbean, Hispanic, Oriental, African, Asian & Dual heritage ethnicity). 

We provide a route for corporate companies to meet ethnic models of all races and we strive to be recognised for our work and made to be an integral part of the fashion industry for models of colour to learn, develop and be exposed to more job opportunities in the field of fashion, Entertainment and film.

Our goal is to make all models from all nationalities equal!

Mahogany Model Management and Top model of colour (TMC)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
